name: Dierachnophobia
description:
Help Dianna fend off the creeping Dieders using her magic numbers.

How to Play:

Left Click: Fire a projectile that changes the value of Dieders it hits.

Hold Down Left Click: Charge up a blast that pushes a Dieder back.

Number Keys 1-6: Expends a die with the matching number to kill all Dieders that share it. A new die appears every few seconds.
